messages.original_text:
Perplexity language tutor is rolling out on the Comet browser and can be accessed through a dedicated "language" tab. 

Konnichiwa 🥷
messages.translated_text:
Perplexity language tutor dah boleh guna kat browser Comet, tau. Nak akses dia, cari je tab "language".

Konnichiwa 🥷
